name: G(100)-p
description:
The year on planet Zurr is 3XX26.1...

Scientific discovery leads the way on Zurr, and the Lenpop race have used their knowledge to overcome many great issues. Healing wounds at a super-efficient pace, creating huge buildings in minutes... They have managed to fix every problem under the Zurr's three suns – except for one.

The art of creating artificial life...

Until now that is!

You play as G(100)-p,  the first artificial life-form successfully created by the Lenpop at their primary science lab. Utilising various technologies found across the local star system, the Lenpop gained the biological and scientific know-how to create you, a seemingly harmless, super-intelligent bug – A total success! Or so they though…

Because right now, G(100)-p is two things…

Confused and hungry.

So go forth, little one! Eat... Grow... Evolve...

Bring the proud Lenpop race their downfall, you cute little bug!

CONTROLS

W-D - Move left/right

SPACE - Jump

1 - Shoot element

P - Pause

R - Restart Level

CREDITS

Saul Ashbridge - Project Lead/Programming

Brandon Knight - Sound Design/Concept Art

George Mitchell - Modelling/Animation

Aaron Rosen - Level Design/UI/Story

KNOWN BUGS

Settings Menu - Volume slider does not change in-game volume

Level 1 - Player may fall through elevating platform when operational

We welcome any feedback you have on our game! Let us know what you think, and if you encounter any bugs, please report them!
